p: Due to their wide application in medicine, food, cosmetics, and other industries, the market demand for the two species was increasing. However, due to the underdevelopment of the cultivation technology of Nardostachys, the industry mainly depended on wild resources. To meet the demands of the market, excessive wild collection has led to a sharp decrease in wild Nardostachys populations and serious habitat destruction. Measures need to be taken to protect the species and develop artificial planting technology for them.
